General.Name: Shian Yih Electronic Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shian Yih Electronic Industry Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells light emitting diode (LED) back light modules. It provides small to medium size LED back light modules, motorcycle and vehicle LED headlight modules, light guide films, and plastic injection molding products, as well as LED packaging, design, and fabrication services. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

1.Name: Chen  Xiu-Zhen
1.Title: Director of Admin. Department and Director of Fin. Department
